title: Roman Kuzovkin
text:
Roman Nikolayevich Kuzovkin (; born 19 October 1994) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Lipetsk">FC Metallurg Lipetsk</a> on 15 April 2014 in a game against <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Vyksa">FC Metallurg Vyksa</a>.
